short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View any YouTube thumbnail in its full size!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thumbnails are the most important part of packaging a Youtube video and the best way to learn to make them is to look at how top YouTubers make theirs. 

But it can be so hard to see the details in the tiny views thumbnails show up in your feed.
With this Chrome Extension, you can see other thumbnails in their full resolution and utmost detail with the click of a button. 

Simply open up a YouTube video in a tab and click on the extension button, you will have a full-size image of that video's thumbnail open up in a new tab. 

When you install the extension, make sure to pin it so the icon shows up on your browser. (Go to Extension settings and click "Pin to Toolbar").

I made this extension to improve the speed of my thumbnail research and I am sharing it for free. Let me know how you like it.
